pkgmetadata.longdescription: Acute Chronic Workload Ratio Calculation // Functions for calculating the acute chronic workload ratio using three different methods: exponentially weighted moving average (EWMA), rolling average coupled (RAC) and rolling averaged uncoupled (RAU). Examples of this methods can be found in Williams et al. (2017) doi:10.1136/bjsports-2016-096589 for EWMA and Windt Gabbet (2018) for RAC and RAU doi: 10.1136/bjsports-2017-098925.
